actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of older Americans in recognition of the 1981 White House Conference on Aging and World Assembly on Aging to take place in 1982.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in honor of older Americans in recognition of the 1981 White House Conference on Aging and the proposed 1982 World Assembly on Aging. Specifies certain requirements for such stamp, including that it be placed on sale on September 8, 1980. Directs the Postmaster to solicit and consider recommended designs for such stamp from older Americans.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of older Americans in recognition of the 1981 White House Conference on Aging and World Assembly on Aging to take place in 1982.
